sentence.text: The first lady nodded and went on nodding for several seconds in quiet contemplation before putting two further questions to him concerning European regional incentives , Government grants and subsidies and their cost distorting influence on investment location decisions .

It was past midnight and we shivered through to dawn in guilty contemplation of our good fortune .
